it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.ip6

Class Ip6Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net.Node
      • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.ip6.Ip6Node
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ip6Host, Ip6Router

    public class Ip6Node
extends Node
    IPv6 node. It includes ICMP support and IP routing function.

    A routing table is automatically created based on the directly connected links and corresponding IP prefixes. Use method getRoutingTable() and method RoutingTable.add(Route) to add more routing entries.

    Ip6Node can act as either a router or host, depending whether IP forwarding is enabled or not. Use method Node.setForwarding(boolean) to enable IP forwarding function.
